definition: lit. the golden bird of the sun sets in the west, the jade hare of the moon rises in the east/fig. at sunset
pinyin: jin1 wu1 xi1 zhui4 , yu4 tu4 dong1 sheng1

sentences.english: "Jade Rabbit"must have discovered soy sauce in moon. So it is replenished.
sentences.chinese: 玉兔一定是在月亮上发现了酱油，所以他康复了。

sentences.english: She was with the rabbit, a silk belt around eternal love.
sentences.chinese: 玉兔伴嫦娥，绢带千古绕相思。

sentences.english: According to a Chinese folktale, Fairy Chang E lives with her moon rabbit in the Moon Palace.
sentences.chinese: 民间传说月亮上有广寒宫，宫里住着嫦娥和玉兔。

sentences.english: Snow in her elegant velvet-like rabbit jumped forward to jumping under the nepotism.
sentences.chinese: 雪绒似的玉兔在她飘逸的裙带下蹦着跳着。

sentences.english: It is an adaptation of the jade hare on the moon.
sentences.chinese: 就是由月亮上的玉兔演化过来的。

sentences.english: In the palace, a jade hare accompanies her.
sentences.chinese: 月宫里，有一只可爱的玉兔陪伴她。

sentences.english: The Jade Rabbit transformed into a girl, curing people from one family to another.
sentences.chinese: 于是玉兔化身少女，走家串户治病。

sentences.english: It was clear that Yutu's true height is around 5600 meters.
sentences.chinese: 很明显玉兔峰的实际海拔大概在5600米。

definition: Chang'e, the lady in the moon (Chinese mythology)/one of the Chang'e series of PRC lunar spacecraft
Palace in the Moon (in folk tales)
another name for Xi Wangmu 西王母, Queen Mother of the West
flat peach (aka Saturn peach or donut peach)/the peaches of immortality kept by Xi Wangmu 西王母
another name for 西王母[Xi1 wang2 mu3], Queen Mother of the West
Xi Wangmu, Queen Mother of the West, keeper of the peaches of immortality/popularly known as 王母娘娘
luan and phoenix/husband and wife/virtuous person/sovereign/belle
the Jade lake on Mount Kunlun, residence of Xi Wangmu 西王母
Sun Wukong, the Monkey King, character with supernatural powers in the novel Journey to the West 西遊記|西游记[Xi1 you2 Ji4]
